name: Minted Yogurt Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1/2 clove garlic, finely diced or grated on Microplane
Tabasco or other hot pepper sauce, to taste
freshly ground black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yogurt, crème fraîche, mint, chives, garlic and lemon zest in a medium-size nonreactive bowl, then whisk to a smooth consistency.
Season to taste, transfer to small bowls and serve with lamb ribs.
